mapper.select: SELECT a.HIST_ID , a.SYS_NM , c.CODE as HIST_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM as HIST_SE_CODE_NM , a.HIST_CN , b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.ATCH_FILE_ID FROM COMTHSYSHIST a , COMVNUSERMASTER b , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c WHERE a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID AND a.HIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE AND c.CODE_ID = 'COM002' AND HIST_ID = #{histId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.HIST_ID , a.SYS_NM , c.CODE as HIST_SE_CODE , c.CODE_NM as HIST_SE_CODE_NM , b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.ATCH_FILE_ID FROM COMTHSYSHIST a , COMVNUSERMASTER b , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c WHERE a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID AND a.HIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE AND c.CODE_ID = 'COM002'
AND a.SYS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND c.CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(a.HIST_ID) as cnt FROM COMTHSYSHIST a , COMVNUSERMASTER b , COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c WHERE a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID AND a.HIST_SE_CODE = c.CODE AND c.CODE_ID = 'COM002'
AND a.SYS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND c.CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
